actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to repeal the provisions of law which relate to the checkoff procedure for financing presidential election campaigns.

summary.text: Repeals the provisions of the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 providing for a checkoff income tax payments for the financing of Presidential election campaigns.

titles.title: A bill to repeal the provisions of law which relate to the checkoff procedure for financing presidential election campaigns.
